texts: Experience across multiple states in India.

2.title: Company Introduction
2.description: Established in 1992 and headquartered in the city of Baner, Pune, Fabtech Projects and Engineers Ltd. (FPEL) stands as a testament to engineering excellence and innovation. With profound expertise in LSTK & EPCC projects, FPEL has etched a strong presence across the Up-Stream (Onshore), Mid-Stream, and Down Stream Sectors.

4.title: PRODUCT DIVISION
4.topLabel: APPROVED BY ENGINEERING CONSULTANTS & VARIOUS REPUTED CUSTOMERS
4.heading: PRODUCT DIVISION
4.description: Fabtech group has five manufacturing units in Pune with advanced manufacturing facilities for manufacturing of heavy pressure vessels, heat exchangers, columns, reactors, etc. in carbon steel, stainless steel, alloy steel & other exotic materials.

5.title: EXPERIENCE AND EXPERTISE ENGINEERING TEAM
5.heading: NUCLEAR DIVISION
5.description: These credentials have equipped to provide design and detailed engineering services, including structural, mechanical, electrical, instrumentation, piping and automation for all phases of our assignments.

9.subtitle: FABTECH
9.title: Our
9.description: At Fabtech, we envision pioneering the global frontier of engineering, procurement and construction. Through our unwavering commitment to innovation, excellence, and sustainability, we aim to foster a world empowered by reliable and environmentally responsible infrastructure. Our goal is to continually elevate our service offerings, reinforcing our position as a trusted industry leader, while contributing positively to the global communities we serve, all within a framework of integrity and enduring stakeholder relationships.

10.subtitle: FABTECH
10.title: Our
10.description: At Fabtech, we envision pioneering the global frontier of engineering, procurement and construction. Through our unwavering commitment to innovation, excellence, and sustainability, we aim to foster a world empowered by reliable and environmentally responsible infrastructure. Our goal is to continually elevate our service offerings, reinforcing our position as a trusted industry leader, while contributing positively to the global communities we serve, all within a framework of integrity and enduring stakeholder relationships.

13.subtitle: PRODUCTS & SERVICES
13.title: Pressure Vessel
description: One of the key products offered by Fabtech Projects and Engineers Ltd is Pressure Vessels. As a leading EPC company, we have a robust track record of successfully executing oil and gas and refinery projects.

Our Pressure Vessels are integral to various industries, providing safe and secure containment for a wide range of gases and liquids under high pressure and temperature conditions. Designed and manufactured to precise specifications, our Pressure Vessels meet rigorous industry standards and regulatory requirements. We use advanced technology & software like PV Elite, Nozzle Pro to produce Vessels that meet or exceed industry standards.

features.title: High-Quality Construction
features.content: Our Pressure Vessels are meticulously fabricated using premium materials, ensuring durability and long-lasting performance. Each vessel undergoes rigorous quality checks to guarantee structural integrity and leak-free operation.

features.title: Custom Designs
features.content: We understand that different applications require unique solutions. That’s why our team of experienced engineers works closely with clients to design and manufacture Pressure Vessels tailored to their specific requirements.

features.title: Superior Safety Standards
features.content: Safety is our top priority. Our Pressure Vessels are designed with comprehensive safety measures such as pressure relief devices, level indicators, and overpressure protection devices.

features.title: Compliance with Codes and Standards
features.content: We strictly adhere to internationally recognized codes and standards such as ASME and API and also have IBR (Indian Boiler Regulation) to guarantee compliance.

13.conclusion: At Fabtech Projects and Engineers Ltd, we have a proven track record in delivering high-quality Pressure Vessels that meet the unique needs of oil and gas and refinery projects. Clients trust our expertise and experience to provide top-notch solutions.
